oai_dc:dc.dc:title: William J. Hale and family
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tennessee State University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: W. J. Hale, the First President of Tennesse Agricultural and Industrial State Normal School (Now Tennessee State University), Was Married to the Former Hattie E. Hodgkins in 1913. He Is Pictured Here With His Wife and Young Daughter. They Also Had Two Sons.
